entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
